FuncDef: The pki sm2 local-key-pair destroy command deletes the specified SM2 key pair. The pki sm2 local-key-pair destroy command deletes the specified SM2 key pair.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the SM2 key pair to be deleted.
The value must be the name of an existing key pair.

Examples: Are you sure you want to delete the key pair? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: It is recommended that you run this command to destroy the specified SM2 key pair if it is leaked, damaged, unused or lost.
